courseName: Human Resource Management and the Future of Work - MSc
facultyName: Faculty of Social Sciences and Law
description: The MSc Human Resource Management and the Future of Work is an intensive master's-level specialist programme for graduates who have a prior qualification in social sciences and wish to develop their knowledge and skills in the practice, theory and policy of the world of work.
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
